original_text: Then Noah built an altar to the Lord and took some of every clean animal and some of every clean bird and offered burnt offerings on the altar.
korean_text: 노아가 여호와께 제단을 쌓고 모든 정결한 짐승과 모든 정결한 새 중에서 제물을 취하여 번제로 제단에 드렸더니

sentences.original_text: Then Noah built an altar to the Lord
and took some of every clean animal
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 정한 짐승 중에서 몇을 가져오고

sentences.original_text: and some of every clean bird
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 정한 새 중에서 몇을 가져와

sentences.original_text: and offered burnt offerings on the altar
